co.tinode.tinodesdk

Class Topic<Pu,Pr>

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.tinode.tinodesdk.Topic<Pu,Pr>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocalData
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MeTopic

    public class Topic<Pu,Pr>
extends java.lang.Object
implements LocalData
    Class for handling communication on a single topic

      • Topic

        public Topic(Tinode tinode,
             java.lang.String name,
             Topic.Listener<Pu,Pr> l)
        Create a named topic.
        Parameters:
        tinode - instance of Tinode object to communicate with the server
        name - name of the topic
        l - event listener, optional
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if 'tinode' argument is null

      • Topic

        public Topic(Tinode tinode,
             Topic.Listener<Pu,Pr> l)
        Start a new topic. Construct typeOfT} with one of com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.type.TypeFactory.constructXYZ() methods such as mMyConnectionInstance.getTypeFactory().constructType(MyPayloadClass.class). The actual topic name will be set after completion of a successful subscribe call
        Parameters:
        tinode - tinode instance
        l - event listener, optional

        public void setTypes(JavaType typeOfPublic,
                     JavaType typeOfPrivate)
        Set custom types of payload: {data} as well as public and private content. Needed for deserialization of server messages.
        Parameters:
        typeOfPublic - type of {meta.desc.public}
        typeOfPrivate - type of {meta.desc.private}

        Throws:

                                                                         java.lang.String update)
                                                                  throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        uid - UID of the user to update
        update - string which defines the update. It could be a full value or a change.

                                                                     java.lang.String mode,
                                                                     java.lang.Object invite)
                                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Invite user to the topic.
        Parameters:
        uid - ID of the user to invite to topic
        mode - access mode granted to user
        invite - content opf the invite message
        Throws:
        NotConnectedException - if there is no connection to the server
        NotSynchronizedException - if the topic has not yet been synchronized with the server
        java.lang.Exception

      • eject

        public PromisedReply<co.tinode.tinodesdk.model.ServerMessage> eject(java.lang.String uid,
                                                                    boolean ban)
                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Eject subscriber from topic.
        Parameters:
        uid - id of the user to unsubscribe from the topic
        ban - ban user (set mode.Given = 'N')
        Throws:
        NotSubscribedException - if the user is not subscribed to the topic
        NotConnectedException - if there is no connection to the server
        NotSynchronizedException - if the topic has not yet been synchronized with the server
        java.lang.Exception

        Throws:
        NotSubscribedException - if the client is not subscribed to the topic
        NotConnectedException - if there is no connection to the server
        java.lang.Exception

      • noteReadRecv

        protected int noteReadRecv(Topic.NoteType what)
        Let server know the seq id of the most recent received/read message.
        Parameters:
        what - "read" or "recv" to indicate which action to report

        Returns:
        count of recepients who claim to have received the message

        Tells how many topic subscribers have reported the message as read.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
